department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Morgan Caputo is the Manager of User Experience and Design at SpringCM, a B2B cloud content provider. Morgan explores the use of prototyping technologies in the communication and validation of user-centric design. Her academic research focuses on how design and communications tools are used by HCI practitioners in the industry. Morgan Caputo is also a Lecturer at DePaul University in the College of Computing and Digital Media, where she teaches in the human-computer interaction (HCI) program.
